title: Microsoft’s Attempts to Sell AI Agents Are Turning Into a Disaster
description: As The Information reports, Microsoft's Azure salespeople are seriously struggling to meet some extremely ambitious sales growth targets.
content: For many months now, AI companies have made a huge deal out of “AI agents,” meaning autonomous software systems that can make decisions and take actions on behalf of humans with minimal intervention.… [+3092 chars]
